text: Tibor Hufnágel (born 18 March 1991) is a Hungarian sprint canoeist who won a silver medal in the K-2 1000 m event at the 2016 European Championships. He competed in the K-2 1000 and K-4 1000 m events at the 2016 Summer Olympics and placed 7th and 11th, respectively. Hufnágel began paddling aged 10, following his brother. His brother did canoeing, but Hufnágel did not want to kneel, and chose kayaking instead. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male canoeists Category:Canoeists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic canoeists of Hungary
title: Tibor Hufnágel
